title: Traptrix Sera

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose to only receive your own notifications

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You know whenever a Traptrix is visited, and who visited them
-Whenever a Traptrix is visited, you gain a random trap hole.
-If this role is in game, all Traptrix roles have basic defense.
-You receive every notification other Traptrix roles do.
-You may multitask
